mapper.select: SELECT NUMMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, TITLEMAC, CONTENTSMAC, WDATEMAC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_board c WHERE c.pcodemac = a.nummac) COUNTMAC FROM ads_board a ORDER BY NUMMAC DESC
SELECT NUMMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, TITLEMAC, CONTENTSMAC, WDATEMAC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_board c WHERE c.pcodemac = f.nummac) COUNTMAC FROM free_board f ORDER BY NUMMAC DESC
SELECT NUMMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, TITLEMAC, CONTENTSMAC, WDATEMAC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_board c WHERE c.pcodemac = n.nummac) COUNTMAC FROM notice_board n ORDER BY NUMMAC DESC

SELECT NUMMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, TITLEMAC, CONTENTSMAC, WDATEMAC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_board c WHERE c.pcodemac = f.nummac) COUNTMAC FROM free_board f WHERE TITLEMAC LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENTSMAC LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT NUMMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, TITLEMAC, CONTENTSMAC, WDATEMAC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_board c WHERE c.pcodemac = f.nummac) COUNTMAC FROM free_board f WHERE NICKNAMEMAC LIKE '%'||#{nickNameMac}||'%' ORDER BY NUMMAC DESC
SELECT * FROM comment_board WHERE PCODEMAC=#{pcodeMac} ORDER BY NUMMAC DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_board(NUMMAC, PCODEMAC, IDMAC, NICKNAMEMAC, COMMENTMAC, WDATEMAC) VALUES(COMMENT_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{pcodeMac}, #{idMac}, #{nickNameMac}, #{commentMac}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET TITLEMAC=#{titleMac}, CONTENTSMAC=#{contentsMac} WHERE NUMMAC=#{numMac}
